## Invitation to Tender (ITT) for Standing Offer Agreement: Laboratory, Soil and Materials Engineering, Geoenvironmental and Building Science Services

**Reference Number:** MX-43019779704
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** VR190022
**Publication Date:** January 29, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 11, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Trade Agreements:** Subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Invitation Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites consultants to submit abbreviated proposals for a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for laboratory, soil and materials engineering, geoenvironmental, and building science services at the Valcartier Garrison and nearby locations. The agreement will be for a period of one (1) year, with the option to extend for up to three (3) additional years.

The services required include:

* Analysis of soils, concrete, and mortars
* Compressive tests on concrete and mortar
* Complete mixture analysis
* Petroleum hydrocarbon analysis
* Volatile organic compound analysis
* Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon analysis
* Metal analysis
* Analysis of perfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS)
* Energetic material analysis
* Dioxin and furan analysis
* Perchlorate analysis

## Award Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the quality and competencies of the consulting firms. The selected consultant will be required to hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

## Bidding Instructions

Bidders can access the Invitation to Tender (ITT) on the MERX website, http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; interested bidders should refer to the MERX pricing page for more information.
